HediffDef.label: Poseidon CS14 cyberbrain
HediffDef.description: A Poseidon CS14 cyberbrain, where the user has had a majority of the brain cyberized and a thin metal shell installed. This cyberbrain is specialized to enhance a user's cooking abilities.

ThingDef.label: Poseidon CS14 cyberbrain
ThingDef.description:
This specialized Poseidon CS14 cyberbrain focuses on enhancing a user's cooking abilities.

The cyberization method has micromachines are inserted into the brain, integrating with larger scale microcircuitry and creating interfaces with the brain. The resulting tissue is a hybridization of organic nervous tissue and cybernetic components, and is superior to the original in everyway.

With only about 20% of original brain matter remaining for ghost retention, drawbacks have begun to present themselves due to cyberization. The user has begun to show heightened emotions as their brain is less capable of dampening such, and is also more likely to crack under pressure.
